data.message: I am looking to reach Eminem himsel of Eminem management....where can i send an email?? It is my husband 40th bday in may, and i want to know his tour schedule. My husband has been a fan of Eminem since his very beginning and I grew to be found of him a lot myself. :) It would just be such a great 40th bday to attend one of his show VIP. And get to meet him and all......For both of us a dream come true thing....Please help! We are from Canada...

replies.message: Thank you for the ""likes'' Please share as well, i need to get the info ASAP, MSG in private if needed!! Thanks a lots! This is important and means a lot to me!!
